title: Dangers of Genetically Modified Foods - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/19
itunes:title: Dangers of Genetically Modified Foods - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/19
description:
George Noory and Jeffrey Smith, a leading educator on gene editing and synthetic biology, discuss his research into the increased use of pesticides and the push by corporations to genetically modify seeds and foods, regardless of the possible health threats to humans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:summary: An exploration into the dangers to human health posed by genetically modifying our food.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
